newsitem.title: GREECE: Ecu/drachma dips below 308.50 on large ecu sales.
newsitem.headline: Ecu/drachma dips below 308.50 on large ecu sales.

text.p: Ecu/drachma was trading lower around 308.35/45 before the central bank's fixing on ecu sales for drachmas from a London-based investment bank after touching an intraday high of 309.15/35 earlier on, dealers said.

"A London-based investment bank came out selling a large amount of ecus for drachmas driving ecu/drachma below 308.50," said forex dealers. "Obviously, they believe there is no reason to change course in the face of no policy change by the central bank." --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
